====== Theme ======


{{:docs:theme:undraw_dark_mode_2xam.svg?0x300|}}

===== About =====
A ''theme'' designs your entire [[:docs:app:app|website app]].


===== Template =====

A theme is composed of several templates that design a layout.

===== Slot System for =====

  * Supports several [[docs:theme:template:template|page layout]] and 4 [[docs:theme:slot:slot|slots]]:
      * [[docs:theme:slot:side_slot|Sidebar]] (left)
      * [[release:deprecated:sidekick_slot|Sidekickbar]] (right)
      * [[docs:theme:slot:header_slot|Headerbar]] (top)
      * [[docs:theme:element:page-footer|Footerbar]] (bottom)

===== Template System for advanced design =====

===== Features =====

All themes support the following features:

  * [[docs:theme:bootstrap|Last bootstrap version (5)]]
  * [[howto:bootstrap-custom|Custom Bootstrap Stylesheet (create and add your own)]]
  * [[docs:performance:cdn|Serve the Bootstrap files by default from a CDN]]
  * Support [[docs:app:tagline|tagline]]
  * [[docs:styling:scale|Size Scale configuration (font and spacing)]]
  * [[howto:getting_started:6_favicon|Favicon]]: Recognized the [[howto:getting_started:6_favicon|favicons]]  (included ''android-chrome-192x192.png'')
  * [[docs:utility:shortcut]]
  * [[docs:theme:slot:railbar|Railbar Menu (Page, User Site) with a private option]]
